CustomField.description: 2021-07-21; part of moving towards a more flexible and scalable way to handle customers owned by Business Development team
CustomField.formula: Primary_Contact__r.Qualified__c && ( ( Account.Generic_Account__c && Amount <= 50000 && Amount >= 300 ) || ( !Account.Generic_Account__c && Amount <= 250000 && Amount >= 500 ) )
CustomField.label: Qualified
